snippet: The Republican Party establishment, concerned that unpredictable and unseasoned candidates have cost them seats in Congress, is trying to head off political hazards wherever it can.
abstract: Republican Party establishment, chastened by unpredictable and unseasoned candidates that have cost them seats in Congress two elections in a row, is trying to head off political hazards in 2014 midterms; influential figures are taking sides in House and Senate races across country, attempting to thwart challenges from the right and retaliating against those who help insurgents in primaries.
lead_paragraph: The Republican Party establishment, concerned that unpredictable and unseasoned candidates have cost them seats in Congress, is trying to head off political hazards wherever it can.

headline.main: Chastened G.O.P. Tries to Foil Insurgents at Primary Level
headline.print_headline: Chastened G.O.P. Tries to Foil Insurgents at Primary Level
